meta.description: Determine the number of supplement pills to buy to meet daily iron and calcium requirements at minimum cost.

params.name: iron_content
params.description: Iron content per pill of each supplement

params.name: calcium_content
params.description: Calcium content per pill of each supplement

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per pill of each supplement

vars.name: pills
vars.description: Number of pills to buy of each supplement

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of supplements

constraints.name: iron_requirement_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure minimum iron requirement is met

constraints.name: calcium_requirement_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure minimum calcium requirement is met
